title: Nuget build reconstruction - Compiler flags
body:
## Background

More details in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8510

Based on https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/8475 create prototype of reconstructing nuget build based on the compiler flags in Pdb.

## Expected output

Prototype pluggable to https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8510

nodes.body:
Compiler flag reconstruction was decided not to be part of the prototyping work.

The acievability and opportunity data were reconstructed via existing nuget telemetry data and are part of the conclusion here: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8510#issuecomment-1531361724
